overview: The film revolves around the family of Mr. Ahmed Abdel-Gawad through his second and third generation descendants, who are represented by Yassin and Kamal Al-Yabni, and the sons of Aisha / Khadija, at the age of young people and the political and social transformations and their impact on their maturity and life. My religion is in search of salvation from his point of view, while Ahmed sees salvation as walking in the direction of the left in search of the values of justice.
title: السكريه
